author: Dr15Jones
body:
There were three member values which were not set. The problem was
found by valgrind while processing a Tier0 job which had intermittent
memory problems.
Also removed unnecessary member variables and made some const.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #9699 (original by @Dr15Jones).
title: Fixed uninitialized value in L1TGMT
